title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dinesh D’Souza & Adam Carolla | 9/18/20
description:
Big tech is shadow-banning a recently leaked conversation between Joe Biden and Ukraine’s former president, allegedly for lacking more context (which Glenn has exposed over the past year on BlazeTV). Dinesh D’Souza joins on the release date of his first feature film, "Infidel," a political thriller that confronts radical Islam, starring Jim Caviezel. Comedian Adam Carolla joins to discuss how Facebook ironically tried to cancel yesterday’s “CancelCon” event.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
